caption: Omnibus Education Reform Bill
first_reader_summary: This bill establishes comprehensive education standards for public schools throughout Georgia.

caption: Healthcare Access and Medicaid Expansion
first_reader_summary: Expands Medicaid coverage to additional low-income individuals and families in Georgia.

caption: Gun Safety and Background Check Requirements
sponsors: Rep. Michael Johnson, Rep. Sarah Williams
first_reader_summary: Establishes comprehensive background check requirements for all firearm purchases in Georgia.

caption: Environmental Protection and Climate Action
first_reader_summary: Implements climate action initiatives and establishes renewable energy targets for the state.

caption: LGBTQIA+ Non-Discrimination Protections
first_reader_summary: Prohibits discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity in employment and public accommodations.
